entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023
